website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice that's easy to use. Simple, durable, and comes in chic colors, too – users say it just works.
pros: Sleek design and a large range of color options just like KitchenAid's stand mixers and other small appliances
Easy to grip and opens the entire can
cons: While it works well, some customers say it's a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...broken after 2 uses...
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine the first two times I used it. Went to use it a third time and it wouldn’t turn and then completely fell apart. I ordered it in late April and apparently was outside the window to return or request a refund by June 1. Amazon did the right thing though and gave a full refund and didn’t have to bother sending the broken thing back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this can opener for about 3 months and it is used 2-3 times a week. As of yesterday it will initially cut into the lid, however it just spins in place and is no longer cutting around like it should. My previous hand can opener was made by KitchenAid and it lasted for a few years. They typically sell quality items, but will likely not order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. For some reason I've had kitchenaid can openers that took off 359 degrees of the can but left the last little bit hanging on. This one is great.
customer_reviews.author: BmoreBrian

customer_reviews.title: Slightly on the large size, but work Great.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent can opener. - The grip is secure - Comfortable to hold - Relatively sturdy. There is a little bit of sideways give in the handles because they're long. - Long handles give excellent leverage. This means less effort is needed to pierce the can and hold on to it. - Large rotator handle makes it easier to open cans with less force.
customer_reviews.author: E!

customer_reviews.title: Four months and it’s not working anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on April 2 and it doesn’t work anymore, I can’t return it either. I was looking for a dependable CanOpener, I’m very disappointed, I thought the KitchenAid would be dependable. They don’t make Can Openers like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: It seems very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for...a thick handle to turn. I've had others that did not have any rubber, and they were very thin and difficult to turn when opening cans. This one has just the right thickness for ease of opening.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Vanaria

customer_reviews.title: First can opener that is easy for arthritis hands
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for me because I couldn't operate others with my arthritis. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: aguybyadifferentname

customer_reviews.title: Blade dulls quickly
customer_reviews.text: This Kitchen Aid manual can opener was delivered to me on May 22, 2020. By August 17, 2020, using it to open a can of salmon was very difficult. Bought this item because of brand. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: This can opener is easy to hold and works very well. Some may find it a little heavy, but that is because it is built well. I bought this one for a Christmas gift because I have had my own for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Risdon

customer_reviews.title: Works very easy on tuna fish cans
customer_reviews.text: Starting takes very little strength to puncture the can. Big T-crank makes moves easily, smoothly and quickly around the can. It easily beats the $200 electric can opener I replaced and never really liked.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Failed After Fewer Than Ten Uses
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working, due to the rounding/flattening of the gears that grip the can lid.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Skapura

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, rusted after washing it before first use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replaced an Oxo Steel can opener that had rusted over time. Before I used it, I washed it and let it air dry overnight. The small pin that attached the two handles to one another rusted. After I washed it for the first time!! I threw it in the trash. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Opens cans with ease.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite can opener. It was a couple dollars more than I saw it before, but it is a great can opener. 5 stars since it opens cans with ease and matches the stand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Jared J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love this can opener. Super easy to hold. The handles are a bit big, but I do not mind. I purchased this as we needed a new one and wanted our kitchen utensils to match. I love kitchen-aid and this certainly meets the expected quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gage Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage. Do not buy this can opener.
customer_reviews.text: In a lifetime of bad can openers, this is by far the worst. 100% garbage. The gear with the blade on it is completely frozen. Locked up. We have cans sitting on our counter that we need to open and now we can't eat because this piece of junk is non functioning. KitchenAid should reimburse us for the cost of our ruined knives that we used to open our cans.
customer_reviews.author: Merv Roland

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid is the best
customer_reviews.text: Just in case the power goes out and my smooth top electric can opener won’t work. Good to have a backup plan.
customer_reviews.author: bird lady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Don't save one or two dollars, this one works and makes opening a can easy.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Works every time
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, flimsier can openers often don't work. This one works every time!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to operate. However, like most handheld can openers, it leaves the lid connected to the can with a tiny sliver of metal at the end.
customer_reviews.author: John Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago. It's been in normal, regular use in my household. It broke. I don't know if I got a lemon. But, I'm disappointed. I typically find KitchenAid to be a good brand. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice grip and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The opener works just like I hoped it would !
customer_reviews.author: e spadola

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream, no rust!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they even make can openers that rust, but this one hasn't and I'm loving how easy it is to use. I've had many electric can openers that rust and went back to trying manual ones. Found this one and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Don't drop the can opener
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy so if you drop it, the impact will dent the blade and you're out $20.. It's also BIG and I guess easy to handle.. unless dropped and then it will just quit altogether. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three days of use
customer_reviews.text: This can opener broke after the first three days. The handle & spring connected to the can opener completely fell off. Don't buy this product. It will work correctly for the first few days, then you'll regret your decision.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, glides well. Kitchen aid makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Was really nice tell the 4th time I used it and the cheap plastic handle that you turn cracked and fell off. Had to finish opening can with a hammer and screwdriver. Great materials now days
customer_reviews.author: James E. Tischendorf

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I waited way to long to replace an old can opener, because this one is easy and sharp. Just what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Halm

customer_reviews.title: The BEST multifunction can opener hands down
customer_reviews.text: It’s the BEST! So mad I didn’t have it sooner. No stress or mess.
customer_reviews.author: Takinae

customer_reviews.title: The brand name, both Amazon and Kitchen Aide, can't  possible wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm....handle tusks very easy and doesn't skip.....that a blessing in it's self. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mamacote

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: It took me four tries to get a good can opener up until now. This one works!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Can opener was junk, it stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.author: rudy jones

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase after first buy.
customer_reviews.text: First one I bought was SO GOOD AN 100% STILL GREAT. BOUGHT A SECOND BECAUSE I OFTEN SET THINGS DOWN, FORGET, AND WANTED 2 TO FIND ONE.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best can opener I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, and does its job with no cursing or failures. Compared to the OXO one we replaced this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie M

customer_reviews.title: This is a great can opener
customer_reviews.text: Love this can opener. It's easy to use and very heavy. Will last a long time. THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in Gloucester

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Constructed of strong durable materials. Easy to handle and good for both right handed and left handed users.
customer_reviews.author: Bulls Fan

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Cheap metal, rusted quickly, became harder and harder to use, finally just snapped opening a small can of tuna
customer_reviews.author: Ken D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Can Opener
customer_reviews.text: This opener is strong and easy to hold on to. Doesn't hurt your hand and cuts very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie I. LaForce

customer_reviews.title: Not Holding Up Well
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking can opener. I have used it about a month and it is already beginning to not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wiberg

customer_reviews.title: Worked about 10 times and now won’t.
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about 10 cans and is now frozen. Now when I try to return it, I don’t have the option. DO NOT BUY this can opener. I will buy a replacement somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: David Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, easy to use but only after 4 or 5 uses and washing, rust appearing in a couple spots. So much for stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: sandd

customer_reviews.title: Good value and well made
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and effortless can opener ...best I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Gourmet Multifuction Can Opener, One Size, Matte Pistachio
product_meta.description: Color:Matte PistachioThe KitchenAid can opener is an essential gadget for any kitchen. The can opener's large, easy-to-turn knob makes opening cans an easy task. The can opener features a sharp, 420 J2 stainless steel cutting wheel and an integrated bottle opener built into the head. This can opener is durable and comes with ergonomic handles to provide a sure grip when in use. The Matte ABS handles Features a debossed logo, ABS chrome plated bolster, and a stainless steel end cap containing a "KitchenAid 1919" Medallion, which pays tribute to the year the KitchenAid brand was founded. Hand wash with warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and dry immediately. One year hassle-free replacement and lifetime limited.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel blade: The KitchenAid can opener is made from strong 420 J2 stainless steel that will easily puncture and open all types of cans
Integrated bottle opener: An integrated bottle opener is built into the head of the can opener
Easy to turn knob: the can opener's large, easy-to-turn knob makes opening cans an easy task.

Ergonomic handles for Comfort: This can opener is durable and comes with ergonomic handles to provide a sure grip. The matte ABS handles Features a debossed logo, ABS chrome plated bolster, and a stainless steel endcap containing a "KitchenAid 1919" Medallion, which pays tribute to the year the KitchenAid brand was founded
Hand wash only: Hand wash with Warm water and a mild detergent; rinse and Dry Immediately. This can opener comes with a 1-year Hassle-Free replacement and lifetime limited.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars562 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
